mapper.select:
select a.id, a.sku_name, a.item_id, a.out_sku_id, a.length, a.width, a.height, a.height, a.weight, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, b.item_name, b.item_no, b.item_brand, c.category_name itemCategoryName, c.id itemCategoryId from wms_item_sku a inner join wms_item b on a.item_id=b.id inner join wms_item_category c on b.item_category=c.id where 1=1
and b.item_name like concat('%', #{bo.itemName}, '%')
and b.item_no like concat('%', #{bo.itemNo}, '%')
and a.sku_name like concat('%', #{bo.skuName}, '%')
and a.out_sku_id like concat('%', #{bo.outSkuId}, '%')
and (c.id=#{bo.itemCategory} or c.parent_id=#{bo.itemCategory})
order by c.id desc,a.item_id desc
